name: Dijon "Potato" Salad

instructions.en: Cook the frozen cauliflower until tender-crisp.
instructions.sk: Varte mrazenú karfiolovú ružičku, kým nebude jemne chrumkavá.
instructions.ja: 冷凍カリフラワーを歯ごたえが残る程度に茹でます。

instructions.en: Drain the cooked cauliflower very well using a colander.
instructions.sk: Uvarenú karfiolovú ružičku dobre sceďte pomocou cedidla.
instructions.ja: 茹でたカリフラワーをざるでよく水切りします。

instructions.en: In a mixing bowl, combine mayonnaise, chopped parsley, Dijon mustard, white vinegar, Splenda, dill, and pepper.
instructions.sk: V miske zmiešajte majonézu, nasekaný petržlen, dijonskú horčicu, biely ocot, Splendu, kôpor a korenie.
instructions.ja: ボウルにマヨネーズ、刻んだパセリ、ディジョンマスタード、白ワインビネガー、スプレンダ、ディル、コショウを入れて混ぜ合わせます。

instructions.en: Add the drained cauliflower to the bowl with the dressing and gently stir to combine.
instructions.sk: Pridajte scedenú karfiolovú ružičku do misky s dresingom a jemne premiešajte.
instructions.ja: 水切りしたカリフラワーをドレッシングの入ったボウルに加え、優しく混ぜ合わせます。

instructions.en: Add salt to taste and mix gently.
instructions.sk: Pridajte soľ podľa chuti a jemne premiešajte.
instructions.ja: 塩で味を調え、軽く混ぜます。

instructions.en: Chill the salad well before serving.
instructions.ja: 提供前にサラダをよく冷やします。

notes: This Dijon "Potato" Salad is a low-carb alternative to traditional potato salad, using cauliflower instead of potatoes. It's suitable for a ketogenic diet while still providing a similar texture and flavor profile to the classic dish. The Dijon mustard and dill give it a tangy, savory flavor, while the Splenda adds a touch of sweetness without the carbs. For best results, make sure to drain the cauliflower very well to prevent the salad from becoming watery. Chilling the salad before serving allows the flavors to meld together and improves the overall taste.
